summary: This is an email chain from June 25, 2019, between U.S. Attorney's Office (SDNY) personnel discussing and circulating a news article about a hearing in the Jeffrey Epstein case. It includes an attached government brief and shows internal coordination regarding the case.

persons.name: Geoffrey Berman
persons.context: Listed as a recipient on the email chain regarding the Epstein hearing, indicating his involvement in the case oversight.

events.title: Epstein Hearing
events.description: A hearing in the Jeffrey Epstein case, referenced via a circulated Miami Herald news article link.

keyFacts: Internal email correspondence within the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (SDNY) regarding the Epstein case.
References a Miami Herald news article covering a hearing in the Epstein case on or around June 24, 2019.
Includes an attached government brief titled '2019.06.24.CVRA.Government Brief.pdf', likely related to the Crime Victims' Rights Act.
Shows active communication and coordination among federal prosecutors (including U.S. Attorney Geoffrey Berman) about case developments.
